achievementCompleted.title: New Unclaimed Rewards
achievementCompleted.body: You completed an achievement! Go claim your reward to collect coins.

connectionRequestAccepted.title: New Connection
connectionRequestAccepted.body: Your connection request was accepted! Check the app to start a new conversation

createAMomentReminder.title: Create a Moment to Make Connections
createAMomentReminder.body: The first step to making new connections is to share a moment while you're on the go. It could be a review, observation, fun fact, or just something funny.

createYourProfileReminder.title: Login to Create Your Profile
createYourProfileReminder.body: Your profile is incomplete. Login to choose your username and set a profile picture.

discoveredUniqueMoment.title: You found a unique moment!
discoveredUniqueMoment.body: Check the map to activate a moment with special attributes

discoveredUniqueSpace.title: You found a unique space!
discoveredUniqueSpace.body: Check the map to activate a space with special attributes

latestPostLikesStats.title: New Likes
latestPostLikesStats.body: Your latest post has {likeCount} total likes. Share moments to earn achievements, make connections, and grow a following.

latestPostViewcountStats.title: Your Post Has New Views
latestPostViewcountStats.body: Your latest post has {viewCount} total views.

newConnectionRequest.title: New Connection Request
newConnectionRequest.body: You have a new connection request from {userName}

newGroupMessage.title: New Group Messages
newGroupMessage.body: You have unread messages in group {groupName}

newGroupInvite.title: New Group Invite
newGroupInvite.body: {fromUserName} invited you to join the group, {groupName}

nudgeSpaceEngagement.title: Claim cash back rewards?
nudgeSpaceEngagement.body: Check in or complete a quick action to claim cash back and discounts
